short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search selected text across multiple platforms with a right-click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this add-on, you can search on multiple platforms by right-clicking on any word in the tab.  

The plugin supports multiple platforms. You can turn any platform on or off in the settings.

The plugin supports the following platforms as a quick search;

- Google
- Youtube
- Wikipedia
- Yandex
- Bing
